item.title: AI chatbots taking over the internet aren’t just shaping your opinions. They’re threatening your personal data.
item.description: Social media is being transformed into an arena where artificial voices shape and drown out human conversation.

item.title: This hedge-fund manager has made about 50% in each of the last two years. Here’s his home run trade.
item.description: Rob Citrone thinks the U.S. will keep its exceptionalism and the economy will boom in 2026

item.title: Long-term-bond selloff is a buying opportunity, says Bank of America
item.description: Investor skepticism towards long-duration assets is a global phenomenon in 2025.

item.title: My ex-wife said she should have been compensated for working part time during our marriage. Do I owe her?
item.description: “My ex-wife and I both recently retired from federal government jobs, and have comfortable retirements.”

item.title: New home sales jump in April to highest level in three years
